def_cn: 无知的;愚昧的;(对…)不知情的
def_en: If you describe someone as ignorant, you mean that they do not know things they should know. If someone is ignorant of a fact, they do not know it.

def_cn: 无礼的,粗鲁的(一些人认为用该词表达此义欠妥)
def_en: People are sometimes described as ignorant when they do something that is not polite or kind. Some people think that it is not correct to use ignorant with this meaning.
